name: Debian Packaging Support
description:
Support for common Debian packaging files (e.g. debian/control and debian/changelog).

This is an IDEA plugin (e.g. IntelliJ or PyCharm) that enables support for some commonly used formats in Debian packaging.
notes:
Changed

  • Bump the compat range for the IDE to support 2021.1, no code changes required.
  • Bump snakeyaml dependency to 1.28
  • Bump lombok dependency to 1.18.20
